com.orgsync.api

Interface OrgsResource


  • public interface OrgsResource

    Access to the organizations resource from the OrgSync API. This allows a client to list and update orgs, as well as add and remove accounts from an org.

    See: https://api.orgsync.com/api/docs/v2/orgs

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Success>> addAccounts(int orgId, List<Integer> accountIds)
      Add a list of accounts to an org.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<OrgFull>> getOrg(int orgId)
      Get an org by its id.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Org>>> getOrgs()
      Get all of the orgs for this community.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Account>>> listAccounts(int orgId)
      List all of the accounts for an org based on id.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Success>> removeAccounts(int orgId, List<Integer> accountIds)
      Remove a list of accounts from an org.
      ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<OrgFull>> updateOrg(int orgId, OrgUpdateRequest request)
      Update an org with the fields specified in the OrgUpdateRequest.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrgs

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Org>>> getOrgs()
        Get all of the orgs for this community.
        Returns:
        a future to a resposne with all of the orgs

      • getOrg

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<OrgFull>> getOrg(int orgId)
        Get an org by its id.
        Parameters:
        orgId - the id of the org to get
        Returns:
        a future to the response with the org

      • updateOrg

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<OrgFull>> updateOrg(int orgId,
                                               OrgUpdateRequest request)
        Update an org with the fields specified in the OrgUpdateRequest.
        Parameters:
        orgId - the id of the org to update
        request - the fields to update
        Returns:
        a future to a response with the updated orgs

      • listAccounts

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<List<Account>>> listAccounts(int orgId)
        List all of the accounts for an org based on id.
        Parameters:
        orgId - the id of the org to list accounts for
        Returns:
        a future to a resposne with the list of accounts

      • addAccounts

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Success>> addAccounts(int orgId,
                                                 List<Integer> accountIds)
        Add a list of accounts to an org.
        Parameters:
        orgId - the org to add the accounts to
        accountIds - the account ids to add to this org
        Returns:
        a future to the response

      • removeAccounts

        ListenableFuture<ApiResponse<Success>> removeAccounts(int orgId,
                                                    List<Integer> accountIds)
        Remove a list of accounts from an org.
        Parameters:
        orgId - the org to remove accounts for
        accountIds - the list of account ids to remove
        Returns:
        a future to the response
